page.title: 17 RELIGION
page.content: Maud Church of Scotland was built in 1876. The present minister came in 1970. In 1886 the manse was built.The church has central heating and two stained glass windows.There is a senior and junior choir which sing to the electric organ.Each sunday Mrs Currier brings flowers to brighten up the church. There are 5 sunday school teachers. The church bell is no longer used,instead they play a record on sunday mornings and at weddings. There are several Methodist, Jehovah witness and Catholic families in the area.Two families go to Ba'hai meetings.We sometimes have visits by young people from Faith Acres Bible School who come to school and tell us Bible Stories and we sing songs with them to a guitar ,like Have you got the Sunshine Smile and Good News.
